name: electron-vite-project
description: Really simple Electron + Vue + Vite boilerplate.
author: cisdi

scripts.build: vue-tsc --noEmit && rimraf dist && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json
scripts.win32: vue-tsc --noEmit && rimraf dist && vite build && electron-builder --win --ia32 --config electron-builder.json
scripts.win64: vue-tsc --noEmit && rimraf dist && vite build && vite build && electron-builder --win --x64 --config electron-builder.json
scripts.mac: vue-tsc --noEmit && rimraf dist && vite build && electron-builder --mac --config electron-builder.json
